about_the_game:
MegaRacer QuantumRush - The Ultimate VR Open World Racing Experience

MegaRacer QuantumRush sets a new standard for VR racing games, offering an immersive open-world kart racing experience. Set in the massive futuristic city Mega City, players can drive unique karts with charming animated characters through various modes. Designed to be enjoyed by all skill levels, from beginners to advanced racers, the game offers diverse content for everyone.

Diverse Game Modes

MegaRacer QuantumRush offers more than just racing – it delivers a wide range of experiences with multiple modes for endless excitement:

  • Street Racing: Speed through the heart of Mega City, requiring agility and speed to win.

  • Obstacle Racing: Overcome complex obstacles requiring strategic play to secure victory.

  • Crown Battle: Capture the crown within a set time and defend it until the match ends.

  • Soccer Mode: A unique fusion of racing and soccer where players use karts to score goals and compete as teams.

Explore Mega City and discover over ten unique modes and special events waiting to be challenged.

VR Optimization for Comfort and Immersion

MegaRacer QuantumRush is designed for comfortable and immersive long sessions in VR.

  • Advanced Visual Processing: Specially designed VR camera and mechanics to minimize motion sickness and provide a smooth experience.

  • Control Options: Experience the thrill of racing with immersive steering controls or switch to a joystick for a more relaxed playstyle.

Kart and Character Customization

Players can personalize their characters and karts to create a unique style:

  • Kart Customization: Choose from a variety of colors, parts, and designs to create your own kart.

  • Character Customization: Customize your cute character with special outfits and a wide range of accessories to express your style.

Racing Experience for Everyone

MegaRacer QuantumRush is crafted for all types of players, from beginners to racing veterans.

  • Diverse Racing Experiences: Enjoy chaotic multiplayer races with friends or explore Mega City for various single-player mini-games designed for solo enjoyment.

Ongoing Community-Driven Updates

MegaRacer QuantumRush thrives on community interaction and continuous updates.

  • Regular content updates introducing new tracks, modes, and customization options.

  • Beta tests and surveys to gather player feedback and improve gameplay further.

Start Your Race Through Mega City!

Experience the thrill of high-speed racing, strategic gameplay, and unmatched VR immersion. Race through the streets of Mega City, take on diverse challenges, and create your unique racing style. MegaRacer QuantumRush delivers a racing experience unlike anything you've seen before.

name: MEGARACER QUANTUMRUSH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Ti
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus Touch or better (Quest 2,3 only)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale

short_description: Experience thrilling VR racing in the vast futuristic city of Mega City. Customize unique vehicles and characters to enjoy your own racing style. Race toward victory with friends and players from around the world in serious yet fun competitions.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
